title: Mango, coconut and walnut loaf cake
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '3 eggs', '175g softened butter', '250g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '340g chopped mango', '40g desiccated coconut', '30g chopped walnuts']
